review: I GET KNOCKED DOWN BUT I GET UP AGAIN......... Wicked game! Soooo much fun. Couldn't stop laughing (and crying) as I tried (repeatedly) to get up the stairs. Beaten by balls, blown up and ragdolled all over the place I will get up and go again! Friends? Ha! It's man against the stairs. Thanks guys for the game! Super clean old school fun. 9/10
amazing game Well worth Ever penny got 18 hours from One play and considering Doing another
